note: Healthcare Professional verification gateway - different from patient gateway, has disclaimer/confirmation content

contentSequences.content: To access this webpage, please confirm...
By clicking 'I Confirm,' you verify that:

items: You are a licensed physician or nurse practitioner regulated by Health Canada.
You are authorized to access information and make decisions regarding medical cannabis...
You understand that the information provided on this webpage is intended for professional use only...

contentSequences.content: If you are not an appropriate licensed medical professional, please click 'Cancel'...

contentSequences.label: I am a healthcare professional and agree to the above terms.
